name: Sibyl's Sunset Carnival
description:
A Halloween Murder Mystery!

An old timey, non-traveling, circus/theme-park was having money troubles. But someone finds themselves knocked out, and someone else has been killed. Time to poke your nose around, to who's gotten into the funny business!

Features:

  • Randomized Villain
  • Character Select
  • Investigate the Crime
  • Look for Clues
  • Clue locations can change between playthroughs

This game is part of RPGMakerWeb's forum contest for Halloween 2020! Wait... Wasn't all of 2020 Halloween?!

It was a while in getting done, but I finally opened up an account to take donations. If you enjoy my early work, and want to support it, please consider a donation. It's much appreciated!
